fixes.name: WARR T (bps)
fixes.dax_expression:
VAR UseCustomDate = SELECTEDVALUE('Use Custom Date'[Display As])
VAR EndDate = SELECTEDVALUE('End Date'[Display As])
RETURN
DIVIDE(
    SUMX(
        'migration_Extract_POC (1) (local copy)',
        IF(
            UseCustomDate,
            IF(
                'migration_Extract_POC (1) (local copy)'[Max Date] = 'migration_Extract_POC (1) (local copy)'[RpDate],
                'migration_Extract_POC (1) (local copy)'[Ut. US MM] * 'migration_Extract_POC (1) (local copy)'[Repo Rate],
                0
            ),
            IF(
                'migration_Extract_POC (1) (local copy)'[RpDate] = EndDate,
                'migration_Extract_POC (1) (local copy)'[Ut. US MM] * 'migration_Extract_POC (1) (local copy)'[Repo Rate],
                0
            )
        )
    ),
    SUMX(
        'migration_Extract_POC (1) (local copy)',
        IF(
            UseCustomDate,
            IF(
                'migration_Extract_POC (1) (local copy)'[Max Date] = 'migration_Extract_POC (1) (local copy)'[RpDate],
                'migration_Extract_POC (1) (local copy)'[Ut. US MM],
                0
            ),
            IF(
                'migration_Extract_POC (1) (local copy)'[RpDate] = EndDate,
                'migration_Extract_POC (1) (local copy)'[Ut. US MM],
                0
            )
        )
    )
)
fixes.solution_explanation: Translated nested Tableau IF logic to DAX IF, mapped parameter references to SELECTEDVALUE('ParameterName'[Display As]), and implemented the SUM of conditional row expressions using SUMX over the source table. Used DIVIDE to perform the ratio safely. All column references converted to 'migration_Extract_POC (1) (local copy)'[Column] format.
